testcase.classname: Login and open lessons area for members
testcase.name: Login with valid user name and password
testcase.system-out: Given User launch browser...................................................passed And User open url "http://localhost/wow/index.php"..........................passed Then User presented with WOW home page having title "Welcome"...............passed And User click on Proceed To Lessons button.................................passed Then User presented with WOW home page having title "Login".................passed And User Enter email "john@test.com.au".....................................passed And User Enter password "goodday"...........................................passed And User press login button.................................................passed Then User presented with WOW home page having title "Login Success".........passed
